Room.Name: Main Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Main Street, which travels north and south from here.
Room.LongDescription: The larger portion of Darby Reynold's Shipyard is located to the west of Main Street here. This large drydock is where most of the ships are constructed. On the east is an advertising shop owned by Margaret O'Conner. The sign above the shop is decorated in ornate silks with the wording "Magnificent Banners".
